title: Trợ Lý Giám Đốc
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH THƯƠNG MẠI VÀ XUẤT NHẬP KHẨU VIHABA
job_description:
Female CEO
Perform tasks such as scheduling, arranging meetings, meeting with partners, customers, etc. At the same time, support the Director with tasks such as booking airline tickets and hotel rooms for business trips.
Synthesize, monitor, evaluate reports of departments, perform data analysis if requested by the Director.
Receive and check documents from departments and divisions and submit them to the Director for approval.
Receive information from the Director and then communicate clearly and accurately to relevant departments, receiving feedback from superiors.
Take notes of meeting information, working minutes, and summarize content.
Participate in contributing ideas and planning company programs and activities.
Participate in supporting the human resources administrative department in implementing other requests of the Director.
Perform other tasks as requested by the Director.
requirements:
Gender: Female
Age: Under 1986
Studied abroad, graduated from University (priority is given to graduates with majors in Economics, Foreign Affairs, Diplomacy, Foreign Languages, and Finance)
At least 2 years of experience working as an assistant to the Director/General Director of a Multinational Corporation/Company.
Have experience traveling abroad
Proficient in English
Able to work independently, thoughtful
Ability to manage time and organize work
Agile, proactive, creative and dynamic
Good office computer skills
Have B2 degree is preferred
career_tags: Khả Năng Làm Việc Dưới Áp Lực

Kỹ Năng Ngoại Ngữ (tiếng Anh Hoặc Các Ngôn Ngữ Khác)
Kỹ Năng Xử Lý Số Liệu
